Literature.Title: New Antimicrobial Peptides with Repeating Unit against Multidrug-Resistant Bacteria.
Literature.Author: Zhong C, et al.

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Mouse erythrocytes:10% Hemolysis=>256 µM,Human embryonic kidney HEK293T cells:50% Cell death=>128 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC 19606(MIC=>128µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=>128µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=128µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 9027(MIC=32µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 700603(MIC=>128µM),Escherichia coli 780(MIC=128µM),Escherichia coli 804(MIC=>128µM),Acinetobacter baumannii 9931(MIC=>128µM),Acinetobacter baumannii 97830(MIC=128µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa 50(MIC=128µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa 73(MIC=>128µM),Staphylococcus epidermidis ATCC 12228(MIC=16µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=128µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=>128µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29213(MIC=128µM),Bacillus subtilis ATCC 23857(MIC=16µM),Staphylococcus aureus 75(MIC=128µM)
